snippet: Kyle Okposo and Lubomir Visnovsky scored 51 seconds apart in the third period as the Islanders ended a three-game skid. The Rangers had five goals in a win over slumping Vancouver.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo and Lubomir Visnovsky scored 51 seconds apart in the third period as the Islanders ended a three-game skid. The Rangers had five goals in a win over slumping Vancouver.

headline.main: Islanders End Blackhawks’ 8-Game Winning Streak; Rangers Rout Canucks
